center.bold: Theda Smith, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Thomas W. Bishop, Jr.,

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, Fourth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court of Champaign County; the Hon. B.E. MORGAN, Judge, presiding. Reversed and remanded.
opinion.attorneys:
Busch, Harrington Porter, of Champaign, for appellant.
John H. Finrock, and John Alan Appleman, both of Urbana, for appellee.

opinion_text.bold: Not to be published in full.
